criteria.description: Clear high-level architecture diagram or description

indicators.excellent: Visual diagram or clear component hierarchy with relationships
indicators.good: Textual description of major components and their roles

indicators.excellent: Each component has specific, non-overlapping responsibilities
Function signatures, data contracts, or API endpoints specified
indicators.good: General description of how components interact

criteria.description: Core data types defined with fields

indicators.excellent: Struct/class definitions with types for all fields
indicators.good: List of main types with some field details

indicators.excellent: Explicit invariants (e.g., 'IDs are unique and monotonic')
indicators.good: Some constraints mentioned (e.g., 'title must not be empty')

indicators.excellent: Multiple operations with detailed flow (user input → validation → storage → output)
indicators.good: At least one operation explained in detail

criteria.description: State changes and side effects described

indicators.excellent: Clear explanation of what changes and when
Enumeration of specific error types with descriptions
Specific recovery actions for each error type
Multiple design decisions explained with pros/cons and rationale
indicators.good: At least one significant design decision justified

indicators.excellent: Clear breakdown of what to test at each level
Specific edge cases or scenarios to test

grading_guidelines.A (90-100): Comprehensive design with architecture, data structures, data flow, error handling, trade-offs, and testing. Professional quality.
grading_guidelines.B (80-89): Good design covering most major areas. Some minor gaps in detail or missing sections.
grading_guidelines.C (70-79): Adequate design with basic architecture and data structures. Missing significant details.
grading_guidelines.D (60-69): Minimal design with vague descriptions. Major gaps in coverage.
grading_guidelines.F (0-59): Incomplete or severely lacking design documentation.

mandatory_sections: At least one operation or data flow
